body.p: Upon transfer of control of the 100 products, the entity does not recognise revenue for the three products that it expects to be returned. Consequently, in accordance with paragraphs 55 and B21 of IFRS 15, the entity recognises the following:

li.p: revenue of CU9,700 (CU100 × 97 products not expected to be returned);
a refund liability of CU300 (CU100 refund × 3 products expected to be returned); and
an asset of CU180 (CU60 × 3 products for its right to recover products from customers on settling the refund liability).
